title: Identification
fullText:
Where Type I RCDs are installed outside the patient area, they shall be labelled with the bed number in accordance with Clause 2.12.1(b).
Body-protected electrical area signs should be located immediately outside the entrance to the patient area, external to the room. One sign may be used to identify a patient's room and ensuite.
Body-protected electrical area signs shall be securely fixed as high as practicable.
